name: Last Chance Racer
overview: You have been retired from the world of Grad Prix racing for some time. the speed finally got to you, the threat of ending up a charred mass on the edge of a black track became overwhelming. But now you want to go back and try again, regain some of that lost thrill. The lost glory must be yours Again. The game has changed since the old days. It has become faster, less gentlemanly. Move violent. It has, in fact, become a deadly race for survival. Last chance racer - a challenge to the senses.
